Class Rider

java.lang.Object
  Rider

public class Rider
extends Object

The Rider class stores information about a rider

Version:
27/02/2013
Author:
A.A.Marczyk

Constructor Summary
Rider(int id, String n, String ty)
          Creates a Rider with a unique id number and a name initialised from parameter values, pre-condition : ty == "Junior" || ty == "Youth" ||ty == "Adult" || ty == "Senior"

Field Detail

idNumber

public int idNumber
Constructor Detail

Rider

public Rider(int id,
             String n,
             String ty)
Creates a Rider with a unique id number and a name initialised from parameter values, pre-condition : ty == "Junior" || ty == "Youth" ||ty == "Adult" || ty == "Senior"

Parameters:
id - it is the responsibility of the client to ensure that id is a unique number
n - is the String representation of the rider's name
ty - is the type of rider. "Junior", "Youth", "Adult", "Senior"
Method Detail

decrementPoints

public void decrementPoints(int pts)
allows a riders points to be decremented

Parameters:
pts - is the number by which a rider's points will be incremented

public int getIdNo()
returns rider id as an int

value returned is rider id as an int

public String getName()
returns rider name as a String

value returned is rider name as a String

getPoints

public int getPoints()
returns rider's points total as an int

Returns:
value returned is rider points as an int

getType

public String getType()
returns rider's ridership type as a String

Returns:

incrementPoints

public void incrementPoints(int pts)
allows a riders points to be incremented

Parameters:
pts - is the number by which a rider's points will be incremented

isJunior

public boolean isJunior()
returns true if rider is a junior, else false

Returns:
true if rider is a junior, else false

isSameID

public boolean isSameID(int number)
Returns true if the parameter is the same as the rider's id number

Parameters:
number - is the value to be compared with the rider's id
Returns:
returns true if the rider's id number is the same as that of the parameter, false otherwise

toString

public String toString()
Returns a String represnetation of the rider

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
returns a String representation of the rider, including the id number,name,type and points
